info.name: DEPRECATED - Flickr WideScreen - GM - Commented ON
info.description: DEPRECATED - It's better for A WIDE SCREEN (1920x1080)! ► What is do? : Adaptation for : " Flickr Commented On (USO Mirror) " TWEAK its "comment balloon" ICONS : More new small icon, Color, Size and Position .... IMPORTANT (2020): It should be better to use now (more updated) ▶ My Flickr ALLinONE styles: - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey ▶ Please Comment and give Feedback if you like this Style :-)
info.additionalInfo: IMPORTANT (2020): It should be better to use now (more updated) ▶ My Flickr ALLinONE styles: - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey - For Flickr Viewers : ► Flickr WideScreen (Viewers) - FlickrHiveMind ► Flickr WideScreen (Viewers - DACKR Viewer ▷ Thumbnail Preview : These Styles are better with this Useful Addon/Script to preview thumbnail on hover (or similar): ▶ Thumbnail Zoom Plus ▶ You Can Find Many Other Updated Infos About Flickr Extensions / Userscripts / Userstyles / Applications..
